name: Bristol Board Game Socials
description: Various social gaming events led by different hosts at Replay Board Game Bar. Regular Blood on the Clocktower game nights and other one-off events, all organised on Meetup.

events.name: Blood on the Clocktower
events.details: Social deduction game night. New players are welcome to join! More details on the Meetup page.

time.frequency: Weekly except last Wednesday of the month

location.address: Replay Bristol Board Game Bar, 196 Cheltenham Rd, Montpelier, Bristol BS6 5RB

cost.details: Entry fee includes a welcome drink. Please pay upon arrival.

booking.details: Please book on Meetup so the host is aware of numbers.
